content.body: zcorpan: Mozilla is stated to support https://github.com/whatwg/html/pull/9309. Is that also true if your comment isn't addressed?

content.body: quick question but someone knows how to make default value for empty or nonexistent attribute in dtd? just quote doesnt work...
and if i have fixed it still demands content

like if i wanted this in dtd: 
```
<!ATTLIST thing type (a|b|c) "c">
```
and this in xml: 
```
<thing/>
```
